post.title: Meet the Team
post.author: ssuslh1
post.excerpt: Your SafeShore Team is made up of 3 hard-working ladies.
post.content:
Kristina Crady

Kristina is the SafeShore Manager and has been running the program since April of 2016.  She has been in the marine insurance industry for 16 years.  Her duties include underwriting and reviewing the new and larger submissions.  In her free time, she enjoys spending time with her family, sewing, and volunteering at her church.


     Amber Lawrence

Amber began working for SafeShore in October of 2015 and is the SafeShore Program Coordinator.  She has been in the insurance industry for 15 years.  Along with coordinating the program workflow, she underwrites renewal business and some smaller new business submissions.  In her free time, she can most likely be found at one of the Disney theme parks or relaxing on the beach.


     Katie Simpson

Katie is the Underwriter Administrative Assistant and joined the SafeShore Team in October of 2017.  She is new to the insurance industry and is learning very quickly.  Some of her administrative duties include proposal preparation, invoicing and audit result processing.  In her free time, she enjoys swimming and biking with her two-year-old son Fisher.
